raw_body:
If you want your AI project to succeed, mastering expectation management comes first. When working with AI projets, uncertainty isn’t just a side effect, it can make or break the entire initiative. Most people impacted by AI projects don’t fully understand how AI works, or that errors are not only inevitable but actually a natural […]
The post Tips for Setting Expectations in AI Projects appeared first on Towards Data Science.
speedrun: The article emphasizes the critical role of expectation management in AI projects, highlighting that misunderstanding AI's inherent uncertainties can jeopardize success. By addressing common misconceptions and promoting realistic outlooks, it aims to enhance project outcomes and stakeholder satisfaction.
why_it_matters: Effective expectation management can significantly reduce project failures, leading to better resource allocation and improved trust among stakeholders involved in AI initiatives.
By educating teams on AI's limitations and potential errors, organizations can foster a more resilient approach to innovation, ultimately driving more successful implementations.

lenses.eli12: This article talks about how important it is to manage what people expect from AI projects. Many people don't understand AI well, which can lead to problems. By setting clear expectations, projects can be more successful and everyone involved can feel more confident.
lenses.pm: Project managers and team leaders will use these insights to align stakeholder expectations with project realities. This approach addresses the common problem of miscommunication, providing a competitive edge by ensuring smoother project execution and reducing risks of failure.
lenses.engineer: The article suggests a structured approach to expectation management, focusing on clear communication about AI's capabilities and limitations. It highlights the need for iterative feedback loops to address uncertainties, but recognizes that inherent unpredictability in AI models remains a significant constraint.
